```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
library(lubridate)
library(leaflet)
```

```{r read-in-datasets, include=FALSE}
fake_measures <- read_csv("~/Documents/repos/S311-plankton-research/fake_data_measures.csv")
fake_data <- read_csv("~/Documents/repos/S311-plankton-research/fake_data.csv")
```

```{r clean-data}
clean_names(fake_data, case = "snake")
clean_names(fake_measures, case = "snake")

```

```{r coerce-variables}
#nequasset_2021$longitude <- as.double(nequasset_2021$longitude)
```

```{r clean-data}
#fake_data <- fake_data %>%
# rename(number_river_herring = daily_total)

fake_measures <- fake_measures %>%
  mutate(cope_or_chae = case_when(
             cope_or_chae == "cop" ~ "copepod",
             cope_or_chae == "cha" ~ "chaetognath"))

fake_measures <- fake_measures %>%
  mutate(funct_group = case_when(
             funct_group == "a" ~ "adult",
             funct_group == "j" ~ "juvenile", 
             funct_group == "h" ~ "herbivore", 
             funct_group == "c" ~ "carnivore"))

```

```{r case-when}
fake_measures <- fake_measures %>%
mutate(size_class_real = case_when(size <= 1.2 ~ 'sc1',
                                   size >= 1.3 ~ 'sc2',
                                   size >= 1.9 ~ 'sc4',
                                   size >= 3.0 ~ 'sc1'
                                   ))

#need to write "between"

```
